Items.Title: Oversight - The Reading and Writing Crisis Among College Students.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Reading and Writing Crisis Among College Students.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation entitled The New York State College Safety Act to require that all campuses of The State University of New York and The City University of New York permit autoimmune and immunocompromised students and faculty to learn and teach via remote instruction in as many courses as feasible whenever students or faculty are dealing with an unpredictable or temporarily debilitating impact of their condition.
Items.MatterName: The New York State College Safety Act
